task_description:
Clean up dependencies, update package.json, and update documentation.

## Update: package.json

1. Remove dependency:
   - "@green-api/greenapi-integration" 

2. Update project metadata:
   - Change "name" from "greenapi-integration-gohighlevel" to "evolution-api-gohighlevel"
   - Update "description" to "Evolution API Integration with GoHighLevel"
   - Update "author" and "repository" fields if present

3. Ensure these dependencies exist (should already be there):
   - axios
   - @nestjs/common, @nestjs/core, etc.
   - prisma, @prisma/client

## Update: README.md

Replace all GREEN-API references with Evolution API:
- Update title and description
- Update setup instructions for Evolution API
- Document required environment variables:
  - DATABASE_URL
  - APP_URL (public URL for webhooks)
  - GHL_CLIENT_ID
  - GHL_CLIENT_SECRET
  - GHL_APP_ID
  - GHL_SHARED_SECRET
- Add Evolution API setup section explaining users need their own Evolution API instance
- Update any API endpoint documentation

## Update: .env.example (if exists)
- Update variable names and examples

## Clean up any remaining GREEN-API references:
- Search codebase for "green-api", "greenapi", "GREEN_API", "GreenApi"
- Update or remove any remaining references
- Update any comments mentioning GREEN-API
